tool_description: Monitors customs clearance status, duties, and potential delays for international shipments across different countries and ports.
error_messages: Invalid country code: Origin or destination country code is not recognized. Use valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes.
Customs database unavailable: Unable to connect to customs system. This may be due to system maintenance.
Shipment not in customs: The shipment has not yet entered customs processing or customs_code is invalid.
Restricted access: Insufficient permissions to access customs data for this route or shipment type.
usage: Provide shipment_id, origin_country, and destination_country codes. Optionally include customs_code if available and set check_duties to false if duty information is not needed.

duties_owed.description: Total duties and taxes owed in destination currency

delay_risk.description: Risk level of customs delays (low, medium, high)

required_documents.description: List of documents required for clearance
